description: A traditional Irish dish with a rich meat filling and crunchy vegetables.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sweet potato,Egg free,Beef,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Traditional Sweet Potato Shepherds Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large white onion, peeled and diced
2 stalks celery, leaves removed and sliced
700g sweet potato, peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large pan to a medium heat and then add the oil.
Fry the onion, garlic, carrot and celery for 4 minutes while tossing.
Add the minced beef and herbs and fry for a further 6 minutes while mixing.
Add the beef stock and allow to simmer for 40 minutes stirring occasionally.
Cook the sweet potato in a pot of salted water for 20 minutes or until soft.
Remove the potatoes from the heat, drain the liquid and mash with a potato masher with the salt and pepper.
In a suitable baking dish, empty the mince mixture to the bottom and then top that with the potatoes.
Grill in the oven for 10 minutes or until the potatoes start to brown nicely before serving.
